name: The Road Ahead and The Roads Left Behind
name_original: The Road Ahead and The Roads Left Behind
description:
Maybe this is all for old time's sake.
One last messy and unprepared trip, a reminder of the past.
You take a deep breath as you follow this stranger to their home.

The Road Ahead and The Roads Left Behind is a narrative-driven game about road trips, making friends with strangers and moving on.

Your road trip doesn't exactly go as planned and so you find yourself on the floor of a stranger's flat, considering the meaning of relationships, friendships and how to move on from them.

Content warnings: mentions of loss of someone close (not death)
